titleStmt.title: At Edinburgh, the tenth day of April, one thousand six hundred and sixty two
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Signed at end: Ja. Wright, Depute.
A proclamation legislating against the adulteration of wine.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
